query:
SELECT
                    pa.size AS "size: _",
                    pa.enc_alg AS "enc_alg: _",
                    pa.enc_key AS "enc_key: _",
                    pa.nonce AS "nonce: _",
                    pa.aad AS "aad: _",
                    pa.hash_alg AS "hash_alg: _",
                    pa.hash AS "hash: _"
                FROM pending_attachment pa
                INNER JOIN attachment a ON a.attachment_id = pa.attachment_id
                WHERE pa.attachment_id = ? AND a.status = 1
